title: Because and So
description: ඉංග්‍රීසි භාෂාවේ භාවිතා වන Because and So පිළිබඳව මෙම පාඩම ඔස්සේ discuss කෙරේ.

mcqTrail.qText: How to build a sentence using 'so'?
How to built a sentence using 'because'?
Nishadi got presents ............... it was her birthday.
I lost my car keys .................. I took a taxi.
'ඊයේ නිවාඩු දවසක් නිසා පාසල වසා තිබුනා.' නිවැරිදි ලෙස ඉංග්‍රීසියෙන් ලියු විට
answers: Yesterday was a holiday, So the school was closed.
The school was closed because yesterday was a holiday.

mcqLesson.qText: I didn't go to school ............ I didn't do my homework.
mcqLesson.review: මම පාසලට ගියේ නෑ මක්නිසාද මම ගෙදර වැඩ කලේ නෑ. යන අර්ථය ලැබේ. ප්‍රතිපලය මුලින්ද හේතුව අවසානයටද දී ඇත.

mcqLesson.qText: I couldn't talk to him ........... he was busy.
mcqLesson.review: මා ඔහුට කතා කලේ නෑ යන්න result වේ. ඔහු කාර්යබහුලයි යන්න reason වේ.

mcqLesson.qText: She is very lazy ................ she didn't study well.
mcqLesson.review: ඇය මහන්සි වී වැඩ නොකිරීමට හේතුව මුලින් දී ඇත.

mcqLesson.qText: He was sick ........... they  took him to hospital.
mcqLesson.review: ඔහු අසනීප වූ නිසා ඔවුන් ඔහුව රෝහලට ගෙනගියා යන්න අර්ථ දැක්වේ.

mcqLesson.qText: The teacher asked him to go out .............. he misbehaved in the class.
mcqLesson.review: ගුරුතුමිය ඔහුට පන්තියෙන් එලියට යන්න කීව හේතුව අවසානයට දක්වා ඇත.

mcqLesson.qText: Select the best combination.* *We left the window open* *The room was warm.
answers: We left the window open because the room was warm.
The room was warm. so we left the window open
mcqLesson.review: හේතුව හා ප්‍රතිපලය යන්න නිවැරිදි ගැලපුමට යොදා ඇත.

mcqLesson.qText: Select the best combination.* *We didn't go on picnic* *It was rainy
answers: We didn't go on a picnic because it was rainy.
We didn't go on a picnic so it was rainy.
mcqLesson.correctAnswer: We didn't go on a picnic because it was rainy.
mcqLesson.review: චාරිකාව නොයාමට හේතුව වැස්ස. යන්න අර්ථ දැක්වේ.

answers: Mr. Perera is a good teacher because his classes are always filled very quickly.
His classes are always filled very quickly so Mr. Perera is a good teacher.
mcqLesson.review: මෙහි අර්ථය විය යුත්තේ පෙරේරා හොඳ ගුරුවරයෙක් නිසා සෑම විටම ඉතා ඉක්මනින් ශිෂ්‍යන්ගෙන් පිරෙනවා යන්නයි.
